name: SpiritualMedicine
0:
”Alexa, open healing scriptures”
”Alexa, start healing scriptures”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: healing scriptures
Developer Terms of Use
des: At My Church Lynchburg we help people get better by teaching them how the word works! And the Lord reminds us in the book of Joshua that we should meditate on the word daily if we want to experience manifestation…Well now you can fortify your faith for healing by saturating your spirit with the Word of God by simply saying "Alexa, open Healing Scriptures” and just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
